Extension_GetDrawingVerticies
virtual std::vector<glm::ivec2>& Extension_GetDrawingVerticies() = 0

This function should only be called by Extension::Draw.  This will return all the drawing verticies position that is already offset by the window titlebar.  Therefore it will not match the global position.
